verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> Of Those <S%G3588><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Bowls, <S%G5357><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Spoke <S%G2980><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Me, <S%G1700><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%>, To Me, <S%G3427><s%> Come Here, <S%G1204><s%> I Will Shew <S%G1166><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sentence <S%G2917><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Harlot <S%G4204><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Great, <S%G3173><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Sits <S%G2521><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Waters <S%G5204><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Many; <S%G4183><s%>

' With <S%G3326><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Committed Fornication <S%G4203><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kings <S%G935><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth; <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Were Made Drunk <S%G3184><s%> With <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wine <S%G3631><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4202><s%> Of Her Fornication <S%G846><s%> Those That <S%G3588><s%> Dwell On <S%G2730><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Carried Away <S%G667><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> A Wilderness <S%G2048><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Spirit; <S%G4151><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Saw <S%G1492><s%> A Woman <S%G1135><s%> Sitting <S%G2521><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> A Beast <S%G2342><s%> Scarlet, <S%G2847><s%> Full <S%G1073><s%> Of Names <S%G3686><s%> Of Blasphemy, <S%G988><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Heads <S%G2776><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Horns <S%G2768><s%> Ten. <S%G1176><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Woman <S%G1135><s%> In <S%G3588><s%> Clothed <S%G4016><s%> Purple <S%G4209><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Scarlet, <S%G2847><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Decked <S%G5558><s%> With Gold <S%G5557><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Stone <S%G3037><s%> Precious <S%G5093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Pearls, <S%G3135><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> A Golden <S%G5552><s%> Cup <S%G4221><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> Her Hand, <S%G846><s%> Full <S%G1073><s%> Of Abominations <S%G946><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Uncleanness <S%G168><s%> <S%G4202><s%> Of Her Fornication; <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3359><s%> Her Forehead <S%G846><s%> A Name <S%G3686><s%> Written, <S%G1125><s%> Mystery, <S%G3466><s%> Babylon <S%G897><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Great, <S%G3173><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mother <S%G3384><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Harlots <S%G4204><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Abominations <S%G946><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Saw <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Woman <S%G1135><s%> Drunk <S%G3184><s%> With <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Blood <S%G129><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Saints, <S%G40><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> With <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Blood <S%G129><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Witnesses <S%G3144><s%> Of Jesus. <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Wondered, <S%G2296><s%> Having Seen <S%G1492><s%> Her, <S%G846><s%> With Wonder <S%G2295><s%> Great. <S%G3173><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angel, <S%G32><s%> <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> Didst Thou Wonder? <S%G2296><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Thee 4671 P-2DS Will Tell 2046 V-FAI-1S The 3588 T-ASN Mystery 3466 N-ASN Of The 3588 T-GSF Woman, 1135 N-GSF And 2532 CONJ Of The 3588 T-GSN Beast 2342 N-GSN Which 3588 T-GSN Carries 941 V-PAP-GSN Her, 846 P-ASF Which 3588 T-GSN Has 2192 V-PAP-GSN The 3588 T-APF Seven 2033 A-NUI Heads 2776 N-APF And 2532 CONJ The 3588 T-APN Ten 1176 A-NUI Horns. 2768 N-APN

The Beast <S%G2342><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Thou Sawest <S%G1492><s%> Was, <S%G2258><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is Not, <S%G2076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Is About <S%G3195><s%> To Come Up <S%G305><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Abyss, <S%G12><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Destruction <S%G684><s%> To Go; <S%G5217><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Wonder <S%G2296><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> Dwell <S%G2730><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> Of Whom <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Are Not Written <S%G1125><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Names <S%G3686><s%> In <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Book <S%G975><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> From The <S%G575><s%> Foundation <S%G2602><s%> Of The World, <S%G2889><s%> Seeing <S%G991><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Beast <S%G2342><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Which <S%G5100><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> And Yet <S%G2539><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>

Here Is <S%G5602><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mind <S%G3563><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> Wisdom : <S%G4678><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Heads <S%G2776><s%> Mountains <S%G3735><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> Seven, <S%G2033><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Woman <S%G1135><s%> Sits <S%G2521><s%> ' On <S%G1909><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Kings <S%G935><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> There Are : <S%G1526><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Five <S%G4002><s%> Are Fallen, <S%G4098><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other <S%G243><s%> Not Yet <S%G3768><s%> Is Come : <S%G2064><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> He Shall Have Come, <S%G2064><s%> A Little While <S%G3641><s%> <S%G846><s%> He Must <S%G1163><s%> Remain. <S%G3306><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Beast <S%G2342><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Was, <S%G2258><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> An Eighth <S%G3590><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Destruction <S%G684><s%> Goes. <S%G5217><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ten <S%G1176><s%> Horns <S%G2768><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Thou Sawest <S%G1492><s%> Ten <S%G1176><s%> Kings <S%G935><s%> Are, <S%G1526><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> A Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Not Yet <S%G3768><s%> Received, <S%G2983><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Kings <S%G935><s%> <S%G1520><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> Receive <S%G2983><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Beast. <S%G2342><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> <S%G1520><s%> Mind <S%G1106><s%> Have, <S%G2192><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> Of Themselves <S%G1438><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Beast <S%G2342><s%> They Shall Give Up. <S%G1239><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lamb <S%G721><s%> War Will Make, <S%G4170><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lamb <S%G721><s%> Will Overcome <S%G3528><s%> Them; <S%G846><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Of Lords <S%G2962><s%> He Is <S%G2076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Of Kings : <S%G935><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those That Are <S%G3588><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Called, <S%G2822><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Chosen, <S%G1588><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Faithful. <S%G4103><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Me, <S%G3427><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Waters <S%G5204><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Thou Sawest, <S%G1492><s%> Where <S%G3757><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Harlot <S%G4204><s%> Sits, <S%G2521><s%> Peoples <S%G2992><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Multitudes <S%G3793><s%> Are, <S%G1526><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Tongues. <S%G1100><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ten <S%G1176><s%> Horns <S%G2768><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Thou Sawest <S%G1492><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Beast, <S%G2342><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> Shall Hate <S%G3404><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Harlot, <S%G4204><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Desolate <S%G2049><s%> Shall Make <S%G4160><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Naked, <S%G1131><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> Shall Eat, <S%G5315><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> Shall Burn <S%G2618><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Fire; <S%G4442><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For God <S%G2316><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Their Hearts <S%G846><s%> To Do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mind <S%G1106><s%> His, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G1520><s%> Mind, <S%G1106><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Beast, <S%G2342><s%> Until <S%G891><s%> Should Be Fulfilled <S%G5055><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sayings <S%G4487><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Woman <S%G1135><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Thou Sawest <S%G1492><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Great, <S%G3173><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> Kingship <S%G932><s%> Over <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kings <S%G935><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth. <S%G1093><s%>
